video.title: Behind The Ink
video.copyright: Viacom Media Networks, a division of Viacom International Inc.
video.series_description: The third season of Black Ink Crew: Chicago explodes with more drama and sexier tattoos than ever before. The pressure is on and the hustle is real for this close-knit group of friends who are trying to make it in one of the roughest cities in America.
video.season_description: The third season of Black Ink Crew: Chicago explodes with more drama and sexier tattoos than ever before. The pressure is on and the hustle is real for this close-knit group of friends who are trying to make it in one of the roughest cities in America.
video.episode_short_description: Hosted by "Black Ink Crew: New York" fan-favorite Sky, this behind-the-scenes guide will include never before seen interviews and reactions to the biggest OMG moments from the New York and Chicago casts.
video.episode_long_description: Hosted by "Black Ink Crew: New York" fan-favorite Sky, this behind-the-scenes guide will include never before seen interviews and reactions to the biggest OMG moments from the New York and Chicago casts.
